member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductProcessorBase`5.SyncDeletedMediaUrls(PX.Commerce.Core.IMappedEntity,System.Collections.Generic.List{PX.Commerce.Core.API.InventoryFileUrls})
member.summary: This method checks for deleted mediaUrls in the ERP and deletes them on the external system. The method checks for product's details and the list of previous images attached to it (before this synchronization) Any image in the details is not part of the list of media Urls to sync, then it is considered as deleted from the ERP and therefor, should be deleted on the external system as well.
member.param: The mapped entity that is currently synchronized
The list of media urls (fileType == BCCaptions.Image)

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductProcessorBase`5.DeleteImageFromExternalSystem(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calls the API of the external system to actually delete the image.
member.param: The Id of the parent product on the external system.
The Id of the image to be deleted
member.exception: In case of a REST error (other than 404), it raises an exception and stops the synchronization for the current object

member.name: T:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService
member.summary: CommerceHelper GrahExtension implements methods and validation rules for the product import.

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.GetNewProductInventoryID(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the inventory id based on the current settings of the store. If a numbering has been defined, it will return the next number in the sequence. If there is no numbering, it returns the external sku. If the external sku is null or empty, it raises an exception.
member.param: The SKU from the external system
The name of the product in the external system (used only in case we raise an exception)

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.IsDuplicateInventoryCode(System.String)
member.summary: Verifies if the already exists in the Database.
member.param: The inventory code.
member.returns: True if there is such inventory code in the Database; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.FindSimilarProductForSku``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Makes a search for a stock/non stock item based on the external sku Look for a stock/non stock item that has the sku as the inventoryCD If not found: Check for an InventoryItem that has the external sku as an alternate id
member.param: The SKU of the product from the external system.
Used to indicate that the sku is a variant and parentId is the template item id.

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.FromInventoryItem(PX.Objects.IN.InventoryItem)
member.summary: Returns a template items from an InventoryItem record.

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.ValidateMergingWithExistingItem(PX.Commerce.Core.API.ProductItem,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Given an existing inventoryItem that matches with the current inventoryItem that we want to import. This method will validate whether or not we can merge the imported product with the existing one. If the merge is not allowed, it will throw an exception. If the current inventoryItem does not have an external sku, then we can merge it with the existing one. If it has an sku: - If it has a record in BCSyncHistory for the current connector, then we can merge it (same inventoryItem that is updated) - If it has not a record in BCSyncHistory for the current connector, then we cannot merge it (it is a duplicate product with same sku but not the same product)
member.param: The matching productItem (considered as the same as the one we want to import)
The ID (not sku) from the external system - same id stored in the BCSyncHistory table

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.GetItemClassFromID(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the item class for the product. 1 - if a substitution list is provided, it will try to find a class that matches the product type. 1.1 - if the class id in the substitution list is not a valid class id, raise an error. 2 - if no substitution list is provided, it will try to find a class that matches the product type (case insensitive 3 - if no class is found, it will use the default class.
member.param: A string representing the externalSystemItemClassId

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.SearchForItemClassByID(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the item class based on the given id

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.ProductImportService.ValidateItemClass(PX.Objects.IN.INItemClass,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Validates the item class and raise exceptions in case it does not exist or it is not the right type
member.param: The item class to validate
The id of the item class (used to raise an exception if it does not exist)
The current Item for which we validate. It is used for error message display only
Number of attributes (options) for a template items.

member.summary: Get a tax category from the substitution list (if configured)

member.summary: Updates options' mapping for a template items before the export. It will add new options / attributes to existing mapping or create new set of mappings so that we can import the template items after the export without having to remap the options.

member.name: M:PX.Commerce.Objects.TemplateItemsMappingService.RemapVariantOptionsForExport(System.Nullable{System.Int32},PX.Commerce.Core.API.TemplateItems)
member.summary: Remap all Attributes/values to the original option/value from the external system. This method is called in the case of bidrectional sync of matrix items. In this case, we need to send back the same options used in the external system and not the the attributes names/values used in the ERP.
member.param: The SyncId in the BCSyncHistory table
The template item to export

member.summary: Remap all Attributes/values to the original option/value from the external system. This method is called in the case of bidrectional sync of matrix items. In this case, we need to send back the same options used in the external system and not the the attributes names/values used in the ERP.
member.param: The SyncId in the BCSyncHistory table
The template item to export
